listitem.para: This command "pastes" back the image that was "cut" (BITCUT) into the current index (or to the clipboard, if BITINDEX is 0). &PRODUCTNAME; "pastes" to the location of the turtle, with the turtle being the lower left corner. See also SETBITINDEX and SETBITMODE.

programlisting.userinput: SETPENSIZE [2 2] REPEAT 72 [REPEAT 4 [FORWARD 100 RIGHT 90] SETPENCOLOR (LIST REPCOUNT*3 0 0) RIGHT 5] PENUP SETXY -50 -50 BITCUT 100 100 CLEARSCREEN PENUP REPEAT 36 [FORWARD 150 BITPASTE BACK 150 RIGHT 10]
